titleStmt.title: God's dreadful judgement upon an eminent person in the Upper Lorain who was wonderfully transformed into a dog. Attested in a letter to a friend, by one Richard Mare, who was an eye-witness thereof; and is a present a lodger in the house of Mr Lyncol a grocer in St. Alban-street. With permission.
titleStmt.author: Mare, Richard.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: the third of August, 1675. Richard Mare.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
